data.text: Chunya bedo mamor gi wer mamit
In ema iber moloyo chwo mamoko
Twe liganglani e bathi, yaye ngʼat maratego;
E duongʼni nyisri ayanga kaka jalocho
Aserni mabitho mondo ochwo chunje mag wasik ruoth;
Lochni nosik nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Nyasaye;
Ihero tim makare to imon gi timbe maricho;
Lepi maboyo duto dungʼ tik mane-mane gi poda kod kasia;
Nyi ruodhi ni e kanyakla mag mondi moluor;
Winji nyara, bed mos, kendo chik iti:
Nyar Turo biro biro gi mich,
Duongʼ olworo ruoth madhako koni gi koni e kar dakne;
Omake itere ne ruoth gi law mochwe gi usi;
Irwakogi e ot gi ilo kod mor maduongʼ;
Abiro miyo ji pari e tienge duto nyaka chiengʼ;
